titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 52) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2008, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 52) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-348, by Ms. Slaughter.
All points of order against the joint resolution and against its consideration are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 122.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 677.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 192 (Roll no. 908).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J.Res. 52 (FY2008 Continuing Resolution).
